user.title: SFML Stats - Welcome
user.description:
Welcome to SFML Stats!

This integration tracks your solar production, battery, grid usage and calculates costs.

Click NEXT to configure your sensors.

sensors.title: Sensor Configuration
sensors.description:
Configure all sensor mappings. Leave empty if not available.

**W sensors** are required for the real-time energy flow diagram.
**kWh sensors** are optional - if available, they provide more accurate daily statistics.

**Required units:**
- Power: Watt (W)
- Energy: kWh (with daily reset)
- SOC: Percent (0-100)
- Price: ct/kWh

data_description.sensor_home_consumption: Total home consumption in Watt (W). Required for real-time energy flow diagram.
data_description.sensor_home_consumption_daily: Optional: Daily kWh sensor from inverter. Used for more accurate daily statistics.
data_description.sensor_solar_to_battery: Solar battery charging in Watt (W). Required for real-time energy flow diagram.
data_description.sensor_battery_charge_solar_daily: Optional: Daily kWh sensor. Used for more accurate daily statistics instead of W calculation.
data_description.sensor_battery_to_house: Battery discharge in Watt (W). Required for real-time energy flow diagram.
data_description.sensor_battery_discharge_daily: Optional: Daily kWh sensor. Used for more accurate daily statistics instead of W calculation.
data_description.sensor_grid_to_battery: Grid import battery in Watt (W). Required for real-time energy flow diagram.
data_description.sensor_battery_charge_grid_daily: Optional: Daily kWh sensor. Used for more accurate daily statistics instead of W calculation.
data_description.sensor_battery_soc: State of charge in percent (0-100%). Battery SOC.
data_description.sensor_smartmeter_import: Smartmeter import in Watt (W). Required for real-time energy flow diagram.
data_description.sensor_grid_import_daily: Optional: Daily kWh sensor. Used for more accurate daily statistics instead of W calculation.
data_description.sensor_smartmeter_export: Smartmeter export in Watt (W). Required for real-time energy flow diagram.
data_description.sensor_grid_export_daily: Optional: Daily kWh sensor. Used for more accurate daily statistics instead of W calculation.
data_description.sensor_price_total: Current electricity price in ct/kWh. From Tibber, Octopus, etc.

helpers.title: Missing kWh Sensors
helpers.description:
**{missing_count}** daily kWh sensor(s) missing:

**{missing_sensors}**

These can be created from your Watt sensors.

**How to:**
1. Go to Settings → Devices & Services → Helpers
2. Create a "Riemann sum integral" sensor (W → kWh)
3. Create a "Utility meter" with daily reset

Or add the following to configuration.yaml:

```yaml
{yaml_config}
```

sensors_main.title: Main Sensors (Required)
sensors_main.description:
**Home consumption is the most important sensor!**

The W sensor is required for the real-time energy flow diagram.
Optional: kWh sensor additionally for more accurate daily statistics.
Solar power comes automatically from SFML.

sensors_battery.title: Battery Sensors (Optional)
sensors_battery.description:
Only configure if you have a battery storage system.

W sensors are required for the real-time energy flow diagram.
kWh sensors are optional - if available, they provide more accurate daily statistics.

**Solar to House and Grid to House are calculated automatically!**

consumers.title: Consumer Sensors (Optional)
consumers.description:
Configure sensors for additional consumers.

These are OPTIONAL - only configure if you have these devices.

**Required units:**
- Power: Watt (W)
- Energy: kWh (with daily reset)
- COP: Decimal number (e.g. 3.5)
- State: Text (charging/idle)

data_description.sensor_heatpump_power: Current HP power in Watt (W). Live consumption of heat pump.
data_description.sensor_heatpump_daily: HP daily consumption in kWh. Use utility_meter with daily reset.
data_description.sensor_heatpump_cop: COP sensor as decimal (e.g. 3.5). Fallback: 3.5 if empty.
data_description.sensor_heatingrod_power: Current heating rod power in Watt (W). Live consumption.
data_description.sensor_heatingrod_daily: Heating rod daily in kWh. Use utility_meter with daily reset.
data_description.sensor_wallbox_power: Current charging power in Watt (W). Live power of wallbox.
data_description.sensor_wallbox_daily: Wallbox daily consumption in kWh. Use utility_meter with daily reset.
data_description.sensor_wallbox_state: State sensor with text: 'charging' = active, 'idle' = ready.

forecast_comparison.title: Forecast Comparison
forecast_comparison.description:
Configure up to 2 external forecast entities for the 7-day comparison chart.

**Required unit:** kWh (daily forecast)

data_description.forecast_entity_1: Sensor with daily forecast in kWh (e.g. sensor.solcast_forecast_today).
data_description.forecast_entity_2: Sensor with daily forecast in kWh (e.g. sensor.forecast_solar_energy_today).
